maltcms.ui.charts
Class XYBPlot

java.lang.Object
  XYPlot
      maltcms.ui.charts.XYBPlot
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class XYBPlot
extends XYPlot
implements java.io.Serializable

This class extends the XYPlot to a Plot with a zoomable background image. This class supports only axis with the same lower and upper bounds like the image.

Author:
Mathias Wilhelm(mwilhelm A T TechFak.Uni-Bielefeld.DE) (mwilhelm@techfak.uni-bielefeld.de)

Constructor Detail

XYBPlot

public XYBPlot(java.lang.String backgroundFilename,
               NumberAxis xAxis,
               NumberAxis yAxis)
        throws java.io.IOException
Default constructor. The dataset and renderer will be initialized with null. ATTENTION: The dimensions of this chart are read out from the ranges of the axis.

Parameters:
backgroundFilename - full qualified file name of the background image
xAxis - x axis of the plot
yAxis - y axis of the plot
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Includes any I/O exceptions that may occur
